channel.title: Blogs on Radion
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Radion

item.title: [CODE] [HACKATHON] DESIGN4GREEN
item.description: HACKATHON DESIGN4GREEN With the school I participate to the Design4Green hackathon. It’s a development challenge to sensitize developers to the importance of Green in IT development. Let’s start this new challenge at 9 today

item.title: [NEWS] [CTF] PREQUALIFICATIONS FOR EUROPEAN CYBER WEEK
item.description: ECW PREQUALIFIACTION After two weeks of work, I am qualified for the ECW finals. With the context, currently, we don’t know if the final will be maintained. It’s the opportunity for me me to thanks all the organization of the CTF. Enjoy and we’ll see for the future.
